name: Save Milwaukee
description:
WASD, arrow keys, or gamepad moves your character.
Space, left mouse button, or gamepad A fires.

You start in the left Jet Dock. Move up and you will launch your jet. Fly around and shoot the alien spiders, but watch your fuel level! Collect the fuel from the jet that drops a red parachute. The baby spiders can be killed by landing the jet on either of the two Jet Docks. Head down into the subway and hunt down that baby spider!

This is a game inspired by an old Commodore 64 game.
